front.title: AAA based Keying for Wireless Handovers: Problem Statement

abstract.t: The Extensible Authentication Protocol (EAP) provides a framework forperforming authentication and key management using the AAAinfrastructure. The framework deals with a model which includes apeer, a pass-through authenticator and a backend authenticationserver.Some of the emerging mobile networks use EAP in handover scenarios inways that go beyond currently defined EAP keying framework. Thisdocument provides a problem statement for the usage of EAP in theseemerging mobile networks.
